title: The Deer Hunter
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

title: Grease
description: Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

title: Halloween
description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

title: Superman
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Visual Effects
description: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

title: Animal House
description: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

title: Midnight Express
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The true story of Billy Hayes, an American college student who is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and is thrown into a brutal Turkish prison.

title: Coming Home
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A woman whose husband is serving in Vietnam falls in love with a paralyzed veteran.

title: Days of Heaven
description: A farm laborer convinces his lover to marry their wealthy but terminally ill boss so they can inherit his fortune.

title: Dawn of the Dead
description: Following an ever-growing epidemic of zombies that have risen from the dead, two Philadelphia S.W.A.T. team members, a traffic reporter, and his television executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
description: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, replicating the city's residents one body at a time.

title: An Unmarried Woman
description: A wealthy woman from Manhattan's Upper East Side is forced to re-evaluate her life after her husband of 17 years leaves her for a younger woman.

title: The Last Waltz
description: A film account of the final concert of The Band, with guest performances by rock legends such as Bob Dylan, Van Morrison, Eric Clapton, and Joni Mitchell.

title: Heaven Can Wait
description: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken to heaven, is sent back to Earth in the body of a millionaire whose wife and lover are plotting to murder him.

title: Up in Smoke
description: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van made entirely of marijuana from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

title: The Lord of the Rings
description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

title: Autumn Sonata
description: A famous but emotionally distant concert pianist is reunited with her two daughters, one of whom is disabled, and old resentments and buried truths emerge.

title: Watership Down
description: A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and establish a new home.

title: The Boys from Brazil
description: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a plot to clone Adolf Hitler.

title: Every Which Way but Loose
description: The San Fernando Valley adventures of a trucker-turned-bare-knuckle-brawler and his 165-pound orangutan.

title: Foul Play
description: A shy librarian and a bumbling detective get mixed up in a plot to assassinate the Pope.

title: Death on the Nile
description: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can he identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

title: The Tree of Wooden Clogs
description: The story of several peasant families living on a farm in late 19th-century Italy.

title: The Buddy Holly Story
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Song Score and Its Adaptation or Best Adaptation Score
description: The story of the life and career of the pioneering rock and roll singer.

title: California Suite
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: Four groups of guests at a California hotel find their lives intersecting in unexpected ways.

title: Interiors
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: The story of three sisters whose lives are turned upside down when their parents separate.

title: The Driver
description: A skilled getaway driver for hire finds himself in a cat-and-mouse game with a determined detective.

title: Jaws 2
description: Police chief Martin Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

title: The Wiz
description: An adaptation of 'The Wizard of Oz' that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

title: Hooper
description: An aging stuntman tries to prove that he's still the best in the business.

title: Magic
description: A ventriloquist is at the mercy of his vicious dummy.

title: Piranha
description: A river is infested with flesh-eating piranhas, and a group of people must find a way to stop them.

title: The Silent Partner
description: A meek bank teller has a plan to rob his own bank, but he gets into trouble when a real bank robber shows up.

title: Eyes of Laura Mars
description: A fashion photographer develops the ability to see through the eyes of a killer.

title: The Wild Geese
description: A group of mercenaries is hired to rescue a deposed African leader.

title: Who Is Killing the Great Chefs of Europe?
description: A series of bizarre murders of Europe's top chefs has a beautiful and talented chef and her ex-husband on the case.

title: Pretty Baby
description: The story of a 12-year-old girl who is raised in a New Orleans brothel.

title: The Big Fix
description: A former 1960s radical, now a private detective, is hired by a former girlfriend to investigate a political smear campaign.

title: The Chant of Jimmie Blacksmith
description: The true story of an Aboriginal man who goes on a killing spree in early 20th-century Australia.

title: Gates of Heaven
description: A documentary about two pet cemeteries in Northern California.

title: Get Out Your Handkerchiefs
description: A man who is trying to cheer up his depressed wife offers her to a stranger.

title: Revenge of the Pink Panther
description: To prove that he is still alive, the former Chief Inspector Dreyfus goes to great lengths to kill the now-famous Inspector Clouseau.

title: Same Time, Next Year
description: A man and a woman who are both married to other people meet once a year for a romantic weekend.

title: The Cheap Detective
description: A spoof of Humphrey Bogart's classic detective films.
